targets.rawSql: SELECT power_normal_kwh FROM `home-monitor`.power ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT power_offpeak_kwh FROM `home-monitor`.power ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT water_m3 FROM `home-monitor`.water ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT heath_gj FROM `home-monitor`.heath ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT $__timeGroup(time,'1d') as time, sum(delta_gj) as delta_gj FROM `home-monitor`.heath WHERE $__timeFilter(time) group by 1
SELECT $__timeGroup(time,'1d') as time, (max(heath_gj) - min(heath_gj)) as delta2_gj FROM `home-monitor`.heath WHERE $__timeFilter(time) group by 1
SELECT $__timeGroup(time,'1d') as time, max(heath_gj) as heath_gj FROM `home-monitor`.heath WHERE $__timeFilter(time) group by 1
